import React from 'react'; import Search from "../assets/icon/search.png" import Like from "../assets/icon/like.png" import Dislike from "../assets/icon/dislike.png" import Share from "../assets/icon/share.png" import Commentaire from "../assets/icon/comment.png" function Conseil(props){ const conseils_json = [ { id:12, user: { prenom:"Nasser", nom:"Nourou", photo:"https://img-4.linternaute.com/ROUIuiso_K2p5B8_xuA9GZJ41CY=/2610x/smart/41072375ec4f4bae808550106194e814/ccmcms-linternaute/10656232.jpg", displayName:"Nasser Nourou", username:"nan0u_b1nks", dateCreation:"le 3 janvier 2022", points:2352, status:"Morphologie de type B majuscule", resaux:[ { nom:"Instagram", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"200 ‚Ç¨" }, { nom:"Tweeter", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Boutique physique et en ligne" }, { nom:"Snapchat", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin" }, { nom:"TikTok", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin" }, ], proprietaire:true, }, titre:"Les rayures en formes", img:[ "https://grossiste-media.com/94830-home_default/haut-raye-noir-et-blanc-avec-boutons-dore-aux-epaules.jpg", "https://cdn.cichic.com/media/catalog/product/cache/1/image/5e06319eda06f020e43594a9c230972d/1/9/190202500248-1/black-striped-pattern-round-neck-long-sleeve-fashion-blouse.jpg", "https://cdn.cichic.com/media/catalog/product/cache/1/image/5e06319eda06f020e43594a9c230972d/1/9/190216100586-1/white-striped-u-neck-long-sleeve-fashion-t-shirt.jpg", ], text:"Le contouring parfait et son regard de braise pour un anniversaire √† Duba√Ø by Milla ‚ú® Vous validez ses astuces make-up ? ü§óüíÑLes Reines du Make-Up Sp√©ciale Milla Jasmine, toujours disponible sur 6play dans vos box op√©rateurs üì∫", hashtags:[ "ronde", "curvy", "rayure", ], date:"", like:12, dislike:8, commentNb:4, }, { id:17, user: { prenom:"Nasser", nom:"Nourou", photo:"https://img-4.linternaute.com/ROUIuiso_K2p5B8_xuA9GZJ41CY=/2610x/smart/41072375ec4f4bae808550106194e814/ccmcms-linternaute/10656232.jpg", displayName:"Nasser Nourou", username:"nan0u_b1nks", dateCreation:"le 3 janvier 2022", points:2352, status:"Morphologie de type B majuscule", resaux:[ { nom:"Instagram", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"200 ‚Ç¨" }, { nom:"Tweeter", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Boutique physique et en ligne" }, { nom:"Snapchat", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin" }, { nom:"TikTok", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin" }, ], proprietaire:true, }, titre:"Les rayures en formes", img:[ "https://grossiste-media.com/94830-home_default/haut-raye-noir-et-blanc-avec-boutons-dore-aux-epaules.jpg", "https://cdn.cichic.com/media/catalog/product/cache/1/image/5e06319eda06f020e43594a9c230972d/1/9/190202500248-1/black-striped-pattern-round-neck-long-sleeve-fashion-blouse.jpg", "https://cdn.cichic.com/media/catalog/product/cache/1/image/5e06319eda06f020e43594a9c230972d/1/9/190216100586-1/white-striped-u-neck-long-sleeve-fashion-t-shirt.jpg", ], text:"ü§óüíÑLes Reines du Make-Up Sp√©ciale Milla Jasmine, toujours disponible sur 6play dans vos box op√©rateurs üì∫", hashtags:[ "ronde", "curvy", "rayure", ], date:"", like:12, dislike:8, commentNb:4, } ] const changePhoto = (p) =>{ const el = "c"+p.id const index = document.getElementById(el) let i = index.innerHTML let newi = 0 console.log("p",p) if (Number(i)===p.img.length-1){ newi = 0 } else{ newi = Number(i)+1 } index.innerHTML = newi index.parentElement.children[1].src = p.img[newi] } const conseils = conseils_json.map(c =>
{ e.target.parentElement.parentElement.classList.remove("act") }}/>
{ p.note_et_commentaire.map(l =>
